help-file.title: LEVITATE
help-file.content:
Syntax: inn levitate (for Githyanki and Drow Elf) Area of effect: <victim> (for spell) | <self> (for innate) Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
"Levitate" allows you to skim lightly over the ground without regard for surface interference.
